useCase.name: Request access to a service offered by a delegate

preconditions.precondition: Administrator requests access to a service

successEndConditions.condition: Access request is approved and access grants are displayed

useCase.trigger: Administrator requests access to a service

mainSequence.step: Administrator requests access to a service
Management UI receives access request
Management API processes access request
Inway receives access request
Management API stores access request in the database
Administrator views pending access requests
Management UI retrieves pending access requests
Management API retrieves pending access requests from the database
Management API returns pending access requests to Management UI
Management UI displays pending access requests to Administrator
Administrator approves access request
Management UI processes approval of access request
Inway creates access grant
Management API stores access grant in the database
Administrator views access grants for the service
Management UI retrieves access grants for the service
Inway retrieves access grants for the service
Management API retrieves access grants for the service from the database
Management API returns access grants for the service to Inway
Inway returns access grants for the service to Management API
Management API returns access grants for the service to Management UI
Management UI displays access grants for the service to Administrator
